front.title: Handover Key Management and Re-authentication Problem Statement

abstract.t: This document describes the Handover Keying (HOKEY) problem statement. The current Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) keying framework is not designed to support re-authentication and handovers. This often causes unacceptable latency in various mobile wireless environments. The HOKEY Working Group plans to address these problems by designing a generic mechanism to reuse derived EAP keying material for handover.
